name: 👁️ (exu0)
description:
A smol game made by @cedric-h & @exu3.

The player character is a Bottle. All of her friends (a book, a broom, etc.) have found a magic talent, but she still doesn't have one :(  So, she sets out on a quest to go from her home village to the Grand Magician who guards himself with lots of Eyeballs.  Along the way, she has to overcome several environmental obstacles which involve fighting the hostile creatures 👁️👁️👁️👁️.

The sprites were illustrated using Piskel, and the game map was created in Blender. The game was made using HTML5/canvas. The code is open source here.
